name: Cute Statue of Rumia
uniques: All newly-trained [non-air] units [in this city] receive the [Eased-Mind] promotion
[+40]% Production when constructing [Land] units [in all cities]
quote: This statue is said to be so cute that you forget your problems just by admiring it.

name: Youkai Teaching Methods
quote: You will be fed to Rumia as a punishment upon not meeting the youkai standards. Legends says she feeds you with love and affection instead.

name: Dark Moon Sanctum
quote: It is said that youkais becomes stronger, or even change forms upon the sight of a full moon.

name: Youkai Training Grounds
uniques: New [Military] units start with [15] Experience [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured
All newly-trained [non-air] units [in this city] receive the [Instinct Restraint] promotion

name: Youkai Training School
uniques: New [Military] units start with [15] Experience [in this city]
All newly-trained [non-air] units [in this city] receive the [Instinct Mastery] promotion

name: Meat Market
uniques: Earn [30]% of the damage done to [Land] units as [Gold]

name: Temple of the Full Moon
uniques: Destroyed when the city is captured

name: 100 Poems for Rumia-chan
quote: After finishing to read the One-Hundred Poems for Rumia-chan, the monk looked up to Rumia, expecting a response. Then, she replied, 'Is that so~'
